医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
赞比亚研究发现财政支持对少女怀孕的影响有限低收入和中等收入国家的许多年轻女孩过早怀孕，这对她们及其婴儿来说可能是危险的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Zambia-study-finds-limited-impact-of-financial-support-on-teenage-pregnancies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Zambia-study-finds-limited-impact-of-financial-support-on-teenage-pregnancies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b3e0fd5-a49e-44e9-a756-ea13de5edb92 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 20:20:28 -0500 Zambia study finds limited impact of financial support on teenage pregnancies
研究表明大麻是一种具有癌症风险的遗传毒性物质根据科学杂志《成瘾生物学》发表的一篇新论文，吸食大麻会导致细胞损伤，从而增加罹患高度癌性肿瘤的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Study-shows-cannabis-as-a-genoknown-substance-with-cancer-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Study-shows-cannabis-as-a-genoknown-substance-with-cancer-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=668cc7ae-aa02-449a-9919-1fff55e3e76f Thu, 14 Nov 2024 20:16:48 -0500 Study shows cannabis as a genotoxic substance with cancer risks
全球糖尿病病例超过 8 亿，凸显采取行动的迫切需要根据《柳叶刀》在世界糖尿病日发布的新数据，全球成人糖尿病患者人数已超过 8 亿，自 1990 年以来增加了四倍多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Global-diabetes-cases-exceed-800-million-highlighting-urgent-need-for-action.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Global-diabetes-cases-exceed-800-million-highlighting-urgent-need-for-action.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28bb7cad-853c-4b1b-80be-d294aa95b215 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 20:09:54 -0500 Global diabetes cases exceed 800 million highlighting urgent need for action
由于免疫覆盖率不足，全球麻疹疫情增加根据世界卫生组织 (WHO) 和美国疾病控制与预防中心 (CDC) 的最新估计，2023 年全球麻疹病例估计为 1030 万例，比 2022 年增加 20%。全球免疫接种覆盖率不足导致病例激增。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Measles-outbreaks-increase-worldwide-with-inadequate-immunization-coverage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Measles-outbreaks-increase-worldwide-with-inadequate-immunization-coverage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37ab56a2-9db1-471c-af16-7779de9a2d1d Thu, 14 Nov 2024 20:08:21 -0500 Measles outbreaks increase worldwide with inadequate immunization coverage
长期久坐行为会导致青少年血压升高一项新的研究显示，从童年到成年早期，每天静坐时间超过 6 小时可能会导致收缩压过度升高 4 毫米汞柱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Long-term-sedentary-behavior-raises-blood-Pressure-in-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Long-term-sedentary-behavior-raises-blood-Pressure-in-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7130127-178a-4774-9213-f0d4b8b4c1ac Thu, 14 Nov 2024 20:04:01 -0500 Long-term sedentary behavior raises blood pressure in youth
伦敦大学学院的科学家获得 7800 万英镑资助，用于开发运动神经元疾病的治疗方法超过 7800 万英镑的资助将帮助伦敦大学学院的科学家开发一种运动神经元疾病的潜在治疗方法，这种疾病目前尚无治愈方法，每年影响英国 5000 人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/UCL-scientists-receive-c2a378-million-funding-boost-to-develop-treatment-for-motor-neurone-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/UCL-scientists-receive-c2a378-million-funding-boost-to-develop-treatment-for-motor-neurone-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f10a171d-81ef-4aaf-9f0b-a988dff0d7b1 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 19:59:00 -0500 UCL scientists receive £78 million funding boost to develop treatment for motor neurone disease
深度学习人工智能模型在识别病理方面优于人类华盛顿州立大学开发的“深度学习”人工智能模型可以比人类更快、更准确地识别动物和人体组织图像中的病理或疾病迹象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Deep-learning-AI-model-outperforms- humans-in-identifying-pathologies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Deep-learning-AI-model-outperforms- humans-in-identifying-pathologies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00ff87e3-6b7d-45fe-ba0c-e790f57f4601 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 19:56:12 -0500 Deep learning AI model outperforms humans in identifying pathologies
利用遗传变异进行更有效的癌症治疗通过利用癌细胞的遗传变异，一种已经批准的抗癌药物在特定患者群体中表现出增强的针对癌细胞的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Leveraging-genic-variations-for-more- effective-cancer-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Leveraging-genic-variations-for-more- effective-cancer-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1f4e6b5-6211-4ed1-94e1-f9f52fd39429 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 19:52:06 -0500 Leveraging genetic variations for more effective cancer therapies
一些基因突变可能可以预防发育障碍特拉维夫大学的研究人员取得了一项非凡的发现，可能彻底改变我们对基因突变及其在大脑发育中的作用的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Some-genic-mutations-may-offer-protection-against-developmental-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Some-genic-mutations-may-offer-protection-against-developmental-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1af8ffe-3ca4-47b2-bd02-abdb6ddd147a Thu, 14 Nov 2024 19:47:11 -0500 Some genetic mutations may offer protection against developmental disorders
研究显示 RSV 对美国成年人造成严重影响，敦促进行更多检测和疫苗接种美国成年人的 RSV 住院率在疫苗接种前就达到了很高的水平，尤其是对 75 岁及以上的老年人影响更大，这凸显了提高认识和预防工作的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Study-shows-RSVe28099s-severe-impact-on-US-adults-urging-more-testing-and-vaccination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Study-shows-RSVe28099s-severe-impact-on-US-adults-urging-more-testing-and-vaccination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a84e884e-3e93-4899-8a5b-4718713ef804 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 18:25:00 -0500 Study shows RSV’s severe impact on US adults, urging more testing and vaccination
